system.description:
You have centered yourself in the natural world and have also cultivated significant personal discipline. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Wisdom increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Your familiar from Nature’s Bond can take the Attack action. If its stat block has an attack, it uses that and adds your martial arts die to its damage and half your proficiency bonus to its bonus to hit. If it does not normally have an attack, it has an attack bonus equal to half your proficiency bonus + your Wisdom modifier and deals damage equal to your martial arts die + your Wisdom modifier.
  • Half your druid levels count as adept levels for the purpose of determining which Focus Feature options you qualify for.
  • Half your adept levels count as druid levels for the purpose of the Wild Shape feature.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in adept, 3 levels in druid
